name: CloudIPC
0:
”Alexa, show me the doorway”
”Alexa, show me the bedroom”
”Alexa, show me the babyroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cloud IPC are designed to help you look after your home and family in a more convenient and smarter way – even when you’re away.Cloud IPC skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now access your Camera via voice control by simply saying "Alexa,show me the Doorway."

After linking your account and discovering your devices in your Alexa account, you can start controlling your devices. 

To look the camera of the Doorway, you can say: 
“Alexa, show me the Doorway.” 

Compatible Cloud IPC App:
The Cloud IPC app version should be 2.4.1 or higher.

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices: 
-Echo Show

*When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the location of where the camera was installed and can be found and configured in the Cloud IPC app. You can also add Cloud IPC cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
